metadata.title: CVE-2021-44759 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Improper Authentication vulnerability in TLS origin validation of ApacheTraffic Server allows an attacker to create a man in the middle attack.This issue affects Apache Traffic Server 8.0.0 to 8.1.0.

criterions.comment: trafficserver: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
